trends: There have been 96 other sightings in Wilmington
There was one other sighting in Wilmington on or around October 10th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was sw bound on independence blvd. approaching river rd. around 20:10. i noticed the lights in the sky as if fairly light stars or flares. redish\orange lights that may have been dim helicopter lights at 8-10 of them over river area. i've not seen any lights like this b4 in that night sky area. helicopters fling in non-formation moving n over the river. as was was driving it looked like between 5-8 lights hovering over the river and as i came to a stop at the entrance to the watermark marina the light dissipated. a number of other lights seemed to rise from the river area into the night sky. no sound. a number of other ppl were parked on road side also watching bit excited. objects dissipated. a helicopter came from the n along the river 15 min after i noticed the lights. no more lights were seen after the helicopter was in the area. we don't have a news helicopter in this city only pd and lifeflight.
Summary: Noticed a number of luminescent lights hovering in night sky over river area.
